column4: Can somebody give me a hand getting my wlan working? I just installed ubuntu on a dell d800, the wlan controller is bcm4306 but it's not working
ndiswrapper is a hit and miss thing, should call it  sortworkswrapper
i think the ndiswrapper stuff went just fine, it's just that i'm not really getting an ip adress. it did detect my SSID so ...
